name: Cooped Up (itch)
description:
Enable full screen.

Cooped Up is about a chicken who tries to escape from her small world, a coop. She has to fight with different animals.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrows - move
  • Space - attack / eat food

Tools:

  • Engine: Unity3d 5.5
  • Art: Photoshop CS6, Aseprite
  • Music: Audacity

Made by @ema1ih (Game Developper) and @culin (Game Art&Sounds).
